updates.title: MCP (Model Context Protocol) security becomes critical focus as AI agents proliferate, with new startup Runlayer raising $11M to secure enterprise AI workflows amid growing adoption across unicorn companies.

Jeff Bezos returns as co-CEO of new AI startup Project Prometheus with $6.2 billion in funding, signaling massive capital deployment in AI infrastructure and potential disruption to existing foundation model landscape.

GPU optimization becomes key battleground as Luminal raises $5.3M for better code frameworks while PowerLattice attracts Intel's former CEO for power-saving chiplet technology, indicating infrastructure efficiency will drive next wave of AI tool performance.

OpenAI's new Applications CEO Fidji Simo plans major ChatGPT expansion focused on making the platform indispensable and profitable, suggesting significant product updates and monetization changes coming in December.

Google expands AI-powered travel planning with Canvas visualization tools and global Flight Deals rollout, indicating major push into AI-assisted consumer services that could impact creative workflow tools.
